backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with many public data types for incidents, messages, evidence, police submissions, summaries, and integrations with stalker profiles and police departments.
backend/police-department.mo: Declares a simple PoliceDepartment type holding basic address and contact details.
backend/stalker-profile.mo: Defines the StalkerProfile type with optional personal, location, and vehicle information fields.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature definitions related to DV Journal dropdown profile deletion, confirmation flow, and input state handling, including affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for numerous frontend React files, describing their functionality and recent feature updates.
frontend/index.css: Sets global Tailwind-based OKLCH color variables, theming rules, and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML document configuring PWA metadata, icons, manifest, and root mounting point for the frontend app.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, categories, and shortcuts for Reporther.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Implements a cache-first service worker handling install, activate, fetch, and messaging events for offline support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, profile setup flow, theming, and global quick-exit shortcut.
frontend/src/components/AnalyticsDashboa: Empty placeholder file for an analytics dashboard component.
frontend/src/components/CrimeHelp.tsx: UI component showing educational cards and resources about crime definitions and legal rights.
frontend/src/components/DVJournalSection: Domestic violence journal module for managing abuser name, journal entries, risk analysis, and stalker profiles.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying branding and external link attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with branding, user info, authentication controls, theme toggle, and quick-exit button.
frontend/src/components/ImmediateHelpSaf: Component presenting emergency contacts, safety plan guidance, and quick-call links for crisis situations.
frontend/src/components/IncidentDetail.t: Displays detailed incident data, messages, evidence, and nearest police department info with options to generate messages or file police reports.
frontend/src/components/IncidentForm.tsx: Provides a form to create new or supplemental incident reports, handle file uploads, validate inputs, and submit data.
Shows a user's list of incidents, supports selecting an incident for detailed view, and handles loading or error states.
frontend/src/components/InstallationGuid: Presents installation instructions for adding the app to devices and offers shareable message templates with copy/share actions.
frontend/src/components/InteractiveSumma: Generates and displays an AI‑produced summary of all incidents, showing tone analysis, dates, and key insights with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Renders a login prompt and feature overview, using Internet Identity login handling and UI cards describing app capabilities.
frontend/src/components/MainContent.tsx: Provides main authenticated app interface with tab navigation for victim info, stalker info, reporting, history, and help sections.
frontend/src/components/MessageGenerator: Generates harassment‑related warning or evidence messages based on selected tone and intensity, calling backend generation APIs.
frontend/src/components/MessageList.tsx: Displays generated messages with metadata, supports copying, sharing, SMS sending, and logs SMS usage.
frontend/src/components/PoliceReportDial: Dialog UI for submitting a police report with optional victim info, narrative, and selected evidence uploads.
frontend/src/components/PoliceSubmission: Displays a user's police report submission history with evidence details, timestamps, and status indicators.
frontend/src/components/ProfileDeleteCon: Confirmation dialog for permanently deleting a saved profile with async delete handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Simple form for creating a user profile by entering a name and saving it to the backend.
frontend/src/components/PWAInstallPrompt: Shows a PWA install prompt, handling deferred installation events, dismissal logic, and iOS-specific instructions.
frontend/src/components/QuickExitSetting: Settings panel allowing users to set or reset the Quick Exit redirect URL with validation and persistence.
frontend/src/components/SavedStalkerProf: Manages viewing, editing, loading, and deleting saved stalker profiles with dialogs and form handling.
frontend/src/components/StalkerRecord.ts: Complex form component for managing stalker info and police department data with CRUD operations, tabs, and readiness checks.
frontend/src/components/VictimProfile.ts: Form for viewing and updating optional victim profile data, synced with backend and Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReadiness.ts: Derives readiness and error state for the actor by inspecting React Query cache and actor fetch status.
frontend/src/hooks/useDVJournalQueries.t: Provides queries and mutations for DV journal features, ensuring actor readiness, permissions, and normalized timestamps.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, identity restoration, and status management.
Hook that syncs state to localStorage with JSON serialization and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Manages PWA installation prompts, iOS detection, and install state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user, stalker, and related profiles using an actor with authentication handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color variables, dark mode themes, and custom gradient and chat-related utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/types.ts: Re-exports backend types and enums for consistent frontend type usage.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitErrorMessage: Maps actor initialization and network errors to user-friendly message strings.
frontend/src/utils/highRiskKeywords.ts: Defines high-risk keywords and provides helpers to detect them in text.
Normalizes timestamps across units and formats them safely into readable dates.
frontend/src/utils/quickExit.ts: Implements Quick Exit URL storage, validation, and immediate redirect behavior.
frontend/src/utils/shareLink.ts: Provides helpers for sharing URLs using Web Share API or clipboard fallback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Offers utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-based values.
frontend/src/utils/waitForActorReady.ts: Waits for the actor query to become ready, handling timeouts and initialization states for React Query.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, responsive screens, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animation utilities.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata and feature requests related to adding a delete option for abuser profiles in a dropdown, including existing features and pending requests.
